1.1.0.name: drupal/node_form_api_fields

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy

1.1.0.description: This module allows you to add fields to an node edit screen via the Form API.  It automatically stores submissions from your Form API fields using the  Drupal 8 Key Value storage rather than creating tables for each field. Useful  for one-off fields that you want to avoid growing the complexity of the  database for.
